name: 2. Dataset Definition
content:
Dataset Overview :

File Name: Name of the source document (e.g., SRS or requirement PDF) used to generate the test cases.

Test Case ID: Unique identifier for the test case.

Test Case Title: A short, readable title that summarizes the purpose of the test case.

Test Case Description: A brief explanation of what the test case checks or validates.

Status: Status of the test case: 0 = Created, 1 = Reviewed, 2 = Approved, 3= Rejected.
